attributes.action: Give up on the idea of making education compulsary to age 18.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When the age was raised from 15 to 16 there were resentful pupils in schools all over the country. There were thousands of pupils who were being forced to be where they didn't want to be, making life difficult for those who did want to be there. This move will make things twice as difficult for everybody. Forcing people to do things creates resentment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
